scripts.install: echo "Installing packages of all workspaces..." && yarn workspaces foreach -A --exclude @tsconline/shared --exclude tsconline/mono-repo -p -v run install
scripts.build: echo "Building all workspaces..." && yarn workspace @tsconline/shared run build && echo "@tsconline/shared successfully built... " && yarn workspaces foreach -A --exclude @tsconline/shared --exclude tsconline/mono-repo -p run build
